title: Drawing, "Patterns and Stamps, Textile Design (1 of 2)", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Patterns and Stamps, Textile Design (1 of 2)", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-69.
